tool_description: Returns tip for movies on Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney + and Hulu
title: Tip for movie

api_list.name: /hulu
api_list.description: Returns tip for movie to watch on Hulu
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tip-for-movie.p.rapidapi.com/hulu"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tip-for-movie.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
